items.sentence: Both of Tom's brothers are taller than he is.
Boston wasn't cold when Tom and I were there.
She was the last to cross the finishing line.
She was fatter ten years ago than she is now.
She was always complaining about her husband.
Tom didn't know how Mary was able to do that.
Tom ransacked Mary's room, looking for money.
I wanted Tom to tell Mary about the accident.
Tom never even smiles when I tell him a joke.
How many people did you talk to at the party?
Tom opened the door and looked down the hall.
We couldn't find all the items on Tom's list.
Tom is a much better tennis player than Mary.
Tom had no idea who Mary had sold her car to.
Tom hasn't talked to Mary since her birthday.
Tom is a much better ventriloquist than Mary.
Tom is expecting Mary to visit him in Boston.
Tom is one of the only friends that Mary has.
Tom jumped out of the bushes and scared Mary.
Tom met Mary's parents when he was in Boston.
My younger sister looks a lot like my mother.
I thought that that would make things better.
That's not something that I can do right now.
Everything will happen the way we want it to.
I'm not ashamed to admit my ignorance either.
I'm not going to make the same mistake again.
I'm looking for my shoes. Have you seen them?
I can't afford to buy everything that I need.
How is Tom's plan different from Mary's plan?
Let's get out of here before anybody sees us.
Let's get out of here before someone sees us.
I should probably tell Tom to do that for me.
I should probably tell Tom I want to do that.
I should probably tell Tom I need to do that.
I should probably tell Tom I have to do that.

I need to make sure that Tom doesn't do that.
I knew Tom would likely not agree to do that.
I knew Tom might not want to do that anymore.
I hope that Tom will teach me how to do that.
I haven't yet told Tom why I need to do that.

I doubt very seriously that Tom will do that.

I don't think Tom would care if you did that.
I thought Tom would be doing that by himself.

I thought Tom was going to ask me to do that.
I think Tom wouldn't be reluctant to do that.
